text:
You come back to the club. 
Everyone has left except bartender, DJ and few of their fellows.
[color=#d91c1c]They don't seem very happy with you[/color]...
Turns out [color=#a49b9b]the plumming[/color] has been broken and [color=#8f4d2c]all the nasty stuff[/color] has come out of the bar counter's sink.

Not only that. 
It's all on bartender's [i]face[/i].

Get out of my club, 
you moron! 
You broke all our plumming!
